title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a big house for a married woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for a married woman is one of the visions that most women see because of their future ambitions and constant thinking about building a house for their children to ensure a decent life for them, and some of them are in a hurry to find out its correct interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for married women carries the interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for a married woman, according to opinions Interpreters, a sign of complete contentment and contentment with life with her husband, even if it is difficult. A woman’s dream of a large and spacious house also leads to ample livelihood and the achievement of a certain goal after a long wait for her and her partner. The dreamer’s vision of a large and spacious house may indicate a strong longing And nostalgia for the past before marriage, if it was old. Which has a website. Interpretation of dreams online from Google. There are many interpretations and questions about followers that you can see. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream of a large and spacious house for a married woman. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin sees that a large and spacious house is for a woman A married woman in a dream means wealth and the abundance of goodness and grace that she enjoys and enjoys. A dream of a large and spacious house for a married woman indicates getting rid of the worries and difficulties that hinder the course of her life during this period. A woman entering a large and spacious house in her dream indicates pregnancy with good offspring, whether it is Children or grandchildren. Ibn Sirin showed that a large, spacious house for a married woman indicates a change in circumstances for the better, and if she is sick, the time for her recovery will be soon. Interpretation of a dream about a large, spacious house for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a large, spacious house for a pregnant woman indicates that the fetus inside her womb is male, and in If the dreamer is in the last months of pregnancy, this indicates the ease of giving birth to a child while she is pregnant. The child will be healthy, and her life will be full of that period and the good luck she enjoys with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a new, big, big house for a married womanCommentators say that if one sees the large and spacious house in a married woman’s dream, this indicates that she wants to give up a sin and repent to God And he asked for contentment and forgiveness from him. Some jurists believe that if the dreamer sees a wide and spacious house, this is a sign that she will give birth to a new baby, and the dream interpretation of the spacious house and living in it could be a sign of her husband obtaining a new home. Business opportunity. Interpretation of a dream about a large, old house for a married woman: A dream about a large, spacious, and old house for a married woman shows that there is a close relationship with her husband and children and she is afraid of anything for them. The dreamer’s vision of entering a large, spacious, but old house indicates that she is happy with a stable life with her husband, and they are bound by bonds of love and affection with each other. The dreamer’s vision of a large, spacious house built of old black clay, shows the extent of tenderness and peace inside it, and that he loves kindness to others and does not He holds a grudge against someone. Interpretation of a dream about building a large and spacious house for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream for a married woman who was building a large and spacious house in...

title: Interpretation of bread in a dream: A loaf of bread in a dream

preview.html: Meaning of bread, white, brown, barley, tandoor, samoon, making, eating, giving, buying, selling with broth and milk, for married women, for unmarried women, for pregnant women, by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about bread and eating it in your dreamWhoever sees in his dream that he is baking bread, He fights for his livelihood to ask for a permanent allowance. The bread is in a hurry so that the oven does not cool touching the place or the money according to the amount of bread coming out of the oven. Whoever knocks on a loaf in his sleep will prolong his life, and the loaf in the interpretation is forty years, so what decreases in the loaf is a decrease in that lifespan. The purity of the loaf symbolizes To the purity of the world. One loaf of one thousand dirhams (a thousand of the local currency). The loaf indicates fertility, blessing, and livelihood that others strive for, so God will remove with it the sadness of the dreamer. If a person sees in a dream many loaves of bread without spreading or eating them, he will soon meet his brothers, and if he sees In his hand is a large loaf, then this is its interpretation: good life and moderate religion. If the bread is made of barley, then this is the interpretation of living with piety and piety. Whoever sees in his dream that he takes a bite of a loaf, then he is a person who lives with hunger. A loaf of bread is for an unmarried woman, and a clean, ripe loaf is for the sultan or the master, and for the merchant is justice and advice. And honesty. The heat of a loaf of bread in a dream is a sign of hypocrisy and prohibition. If a man sees a loaf hanging on his forehead, then the dream indicates his injustice or poverty. Loaves of white bread indicate a lot of money that will not benefit its owner and zakat will not be paid. Bread of faith; Because it is a narrow food for the one who sees in his dream that he is eating it; Because he does not bake it unless he is forced. Whoever dreams that he is eating bread without broth will get very sick and die strangely. Bread that is not baked has a severe fever, because it must be put in the fire until it is baked. A hot talk show bread indicates a boy (for a pregnant woman). Eating tortilla bread is A sign of abundant livelihood and profit. It was said: The tenderness of bread is a sign of the shortness of life. Loaves of bread show a small profit, which is visible to many. Good bread in an unmarried girl’s dream means that you will hear happy news, and a loaf of bread often shows money in the interpretation. Buying bread is worthy of praise because its expression is good in the future and this goodness can be associated with success in work and study. Therefore, Making bread expresses a good deed or deed. If a girl sees that she is kneading it and baking it, she puts it in the oven. If it came out of the oven looking delicious and wonderful, and it gained people’s approval, then this is an interpretation of success in an important matter such as marriage, engagement, or work. Eating barley bread indicates perseverance and patience. A brown loaf in a dream of an unmarried girl often indicates a noble man. The best vision of bread is that Ripe and delicious. Bread is a sign of honesty in dealing, and sometimes a good person appears. Preparing bread in a dream is better than buying it for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself preparing a large number of loaves or loaves of bread, this is evidence of kindness, livelihood, and private money. It is praiseworthy in a dream that a woman in Her dream is that she gives the child a loaf of bread or bread

Good bread in the dream of an unmarried girl means that you will hear happy news, and a loaf of bread often shows money in the interpretation. Buying bread is commendable because its expression is good in the future and this good can be associated with success in work and study. Therefore, making bread expresses a good deed or work. If the girl sees that she is kneading it and baking it, she puts it in the oven. If it comes out of the oven for her that it is delicious and wonderful, and it wins the approval of people, this is an interpretation of success in an important matter such as marriage, engagement or work. Eating barley bread indicates perseverance and patience. A brown loaf in the dream of an unmarried girl often indicates a noble man. The best vision of bread is that it is ripe and delicious. Bread is a sign of honesty in dealing and sometimes shows a good person. Preparing bread in a dream is better than buying it for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself preparing a large number of loaves or loaves of bread, this is evidence of kindness, livelihood and private money. title: Interpretation of a dream about birds in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about birds in a dream Al-Asamit Interpretation of dreams Birds in a dream If they die, this is a sign of sadness and the loss of a family member. Hearing the sound of birds in a dream, which is beautiful, means that you hear the happy news, or an indication of the return of the absent. Seeing a bird in a dream is a sign of many The money that the dreamer gets. If a person sees in his dream that he is hunting birds, this means that he will be in an excellent position in his work. Slaughtering birds in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will triumph over his enemies. Interpretation of a dream about birds in one dream. Seeing a bird in a dream for a girl being single is evidence of the existence of A very rich man in her life, but he does not return the same feelings of love. As for buying birds in a dream, it is a sign of deception that she will be exposed to in the coming period. Dreaming about birds, the color black indicates that this girl is exposed to many problems. Hearing the sound of evil birds chirping is a sign of bad news. If She saw a bird in a cage in a dream, this indicates that she will marry a man with a strong personality. Catching birds in a dream is a sign of commitment to being close to the right person. Interpretation of a dream about birds in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees a bird falling on her hand, this indicates wealth and abundance of money. Which she gets. If she sees the bird walking behind her, this is an indication of the happiness that she will achieve. Seeing a white bird in a dream is a sign that you will escape from the worries and problems that you fall into. Slaughtering a bird in a dream indicates many good things that you will get in the period Next.Interpretation of a dream about birds for a man. I mean a dream about birds: a colored man with bad morals. If a person sees a bird standing on his head, this indicates the actions of a fortuneteller. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing washing in a dream

preview.html: Washing clothes in a dream is one of the most common dreams that a married woman has about clothes, and some people are often interested in knowing their interpretation and what it shows, is it good or bad? !! Is this due to the influence of the subconscious or not? !! In this article, we present together the most important interpretations and sayings of scholars when ... Washing clothes in a dream If an unmarried woman sees washing in a dream, this means that she is always thinking and preoccupying her mind with marriage, and if the washing is more than necessary, this indicates the financial crises that she is exposed to even in the case of washing. Clothes show the extent of the benefits and profits from them. If the dreamer gets married and sees that she is washing her husband's clothes, this indicates her love and tenderness towards him and gives him great respect, but if she is washing his underwear, this indicates that she wants to get closer to satisfaction. Her desires, and if the clothes are for her children, this indicates kindness and elevation over them. Imam Al-Nabulsi narrates the interpretation of the dream of washing in a dream as good news to get rid of the fatigue and obstacles that the dreamer has been living for a long time. Which has a websiteInterpretation of dreams onlineFrom Google, you can see many interpretations and questions about followers. Washing in a dream by Ibn SirinScholars, including Ibn Sirin, believe that the dream of washing in a dream means that the dreamer is always thinking about the bad deeds he has committed before, and seeing washing in a dream may mean that the dreamer has problems and disputes between him and others. A person in something and wants to reconcile with him. It was mentioned in Ibn Sirin’s book “Makhtab Al-Kalam” that dirty clothes indicate sins and washing them indicates that the dreamer repented to his Lord and regretted what he did. When the dreamer touches the clothes with water while wearing them, this means that he travels outside the country or remains as he is now. When the dreamer washes in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, this indicates the goodness and livelihood that will come to him. Washing clothes in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees that she is collecting a lot of dirty clothes and washing them, this indicates the extent of her obedience and respect for her parents and their honor. Jurists believe that washing an unmarried girl is evidence of a lot of good news in her life. When the dreamer washes dirty clothes with her hands, this indicates the date of her approaching engagement or marriage. When an unmarried girl washes her underwear, this shows her desire to marry. A washing machine in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is washing her life partner’s clothes, this indicates the extent of affection, love and stability between them. If a woman sees that she is washing clothes Her husband and her attachment, this indicates the extent of honesty and sincerity in her home, her interest in her and her work to live in a stable environment. If a woman sees that her husband’s laundry is hanging, whether it is natural or internal, this indicates the connection and understanding between them. If the fortune teller washes the clothes after hanging them, this indicates the extent of loyalty, self-control and mutual love between family members. Washing in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams of washing or

If the fortuneteller washes the clothes after hanging them, this indicates the extent of loyalty, self-control and mutual love between family members. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a wolf attack in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about a wolf bite in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a wolf attack in a dream Is seeing a wolf attacking a good or bad thing? What are the bad connotations of a dream about a wolf attack? What does it mean when a black wolf attacks you in a dream? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a wolf attacking the unmarried, the married, the pregnant, and the man, according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Seeing a wolf attack in a dream. Scientists interpreted the attack of gold in a dream as an indication of the problems and difficulties that the dreamer is currently facing in his life and is unable to overcome them. , you will soon face legal problems, so he must be careful. Scientists interpret seeing many wolves attacking the dreamer as being surrounded by corrupt people and fraudsters who conspire against him and do not wish him well. He attacks him, as this indicates her courage and boldness, and her stand against the oppressors, and she fears only God Almighty. Seeing a wolf attack in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a wolf attacking as a sign of the dreamer’s many enemies, and the dreamer carries a warning message telling him to be careful in all the steps he takes in the coming period. If the dreamer sees a wolf attacking him in his house, this means that he will soon be robbed and he must be more careful with his money. If the wolf that attacks the dreamer turns into a human, this indicates that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will soon lead him to repentance and forgive his sins. The interpretation site is distinguished Online dream specialist with a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Online Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Seeing a wolf attacking in a dream for a single woman. Commentators said that seeing a wolf attacking an unmarried woman in her dream is a sign that she will soon suffer great injustice from someone stronger than her or who has authority over her. If the dreamer sees a wolf attacking her And turns into a human, it means that she will get rid of some of the negative habits that she suffered from and will soon change many things in her life for the better. Evil does not carry her good intentions and pushes her to make mistakes. Seeing a wolf attacking a married woman’s dream: Scientists interpreted seeing a wolf attacking a married woman as a sign that her partner will betray and deceive her and that she will soon separate from him. Some interpreters said that a wolf in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is unjustly imprisoned, She must ask the Lord (Almighty) to protect her from harm and to perpetuate the blessings she has. You will not be able to get out of it until after a long time. Seeing a wolf attacking a pregnant woman’s dream. Scientists interpreted the dream of a wolf attacking a pregnant woman as a sign of male reproduction and that God (the Most High) is the only one who knows what is in the wombs. A dream about a pregnant woman indicates that there is someone who will not fulfill his promises to her. If the dreamer sees that her partner turns into a wolf and attacks her, this means that he does not appreciate the suffering that she goes through during pregnancy and makes her angry on many issues. Seeing a wolf attack in a married man’s dream has been interpreted Scientists consider a wolf attack in a married man’s dream to be a sign of a hypocrite who will harm him in many matters and make him envious of the blessings he has, so he should

title: Interpretation of a dream about candles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing candles in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi We will try to present to the readers during this article a group of visions of seeing candles in a dream with interpretations of these visions, with a warning to the reader that it is undesirable to draw any interpretations. You may also know the lion in a dream, we will refer it to any other vision He saw it, even if there was a match between the two visions, because the interpretation of dreams is a fatwa that requires a specialized scholar who can listen to the dreamer and know all the details and not just from the dream, but after the details of the dreamer’s life so that he can interpret the vision correctly.Interpretation of seeing candles Waxing in a dream refers to Happy news that will come to the person soon.Interpretation of candles in a dreamCandles indicate the fulfillment of visionary ambition.Interpretation of candles in a dream according to NablusCandles in a dream will indicate a change in circumstances for the better.Read also: Toilet in a dreamInterpretation of seeing candles in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing candles in a dream Ibn Sirin believes You will see that the interpretation of seeing candles in a dream has many connotations, many of which symbolize goodness. Such as a dream with a large number of candles that cannot be counted, this is a sign of the dreamer’s long life. Just as the dreamer sees burning candles in a dream, this may be a person with money that He will earn it, especially if the color of the candles is silver or gold. Just like a candle exploding in a dream at a celebration or occasion, this may indicate failure, especially if the dreamer is a student, this may be a harbinger of failure in exams. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing candles in Dream of Nabulsi: Imam Nabulsi says that the interpretation of seeing candles in a dream symbolizes a noble boy or a sultan. Also, candles in a dream can indicate that the dreamer will be able to earn a lot of money in the coming period - God willing -. In addition to seeing candles in a dream, he says Imam Nabulsi said that from humanity the poor will become rich and the sinner will be guided to the right path. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing candles in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees a single white candle in a dream, it shows her passionate feelings and the love that fills her chest. title: Interpretation of a dream about fog for a man and a woman

preview.html: Meteorologists at that time advised against walking on roads and preventing maritime navigation to avoid shipwreck that might happen to ships, and for this reason seeing fog in a dream around it creates many questions that we will learn from our article. Interpretation of a dream about fog by Ibn Sirin Fog in a dream, as Ibn Sirin explains Sirin, a sign of rebellion and murder. Fog in a dream indicates hidden matters and secrets that the dreamer was not aware of. Fog in a dream also indicates anxiety and fear. Seeing a lot of fog in a dream means fraud and deception. Fog in a dream indicates that you are walking in The wrong path. Interpretation of a dream about fog for Nablus. Seeing fog in a dream indicates that the dreamer does not trust those around him. Seeing fog in a dreamer who wants to travel is evidence of problems that the dreamer will fall into. Seeing a person in a dream while passing through the fog, he will face many difficulties in his next life. Interpretation of a dream about fog for a single woman: Fog in an unmarried girl’s dream is an indication of a scandal that she will face soon, but she will be able to prove her innocence in front of her family and relatives. If a girl sees in her dream that fog noticeably covers the sky, this means that she is one of the hesitant personalities in her life. If she The girl cannot see well in the dream because of the fog, as this indicates that she is unable to reveal the truth of what is going on around her. Seeing a girl in a dream, the fog disappearing in front of her, this indicates a bright future and happiness that she will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about fog for a married woman. Fog in a dream for a married woman Evidence of some psychological pressures and marital problems that she is experiencing. Seeing a lot of fog in the house indicates this woman’s inability to know the truth about some of the things that are happening in her house. Interpretation of a dream about fog for a pregnant woman. Fog in a pregnant dream is evidence of your anxiety about childbirth. Fog in a dream can indicate A pregnant woman indicates that she will overcome all the difficulties associated with childbirth and it will be easy. Interpretation of a dream about fog for a man: If one sees in a dream fog falling on him, this indicates the need to stay away from trouble and fear God in everything he does. For a man, fog indicates difficulties and obstacles that He experiences it in his life. Seeing black fog in a man’s dream indicates the presence of people’s interference in his life. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will answer it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing clothes cut in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing clothes cut in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The process of cutting clothes is a way to adjust the length or repair to suit the person using scissors. Seeing clothes being cut in a dream is evidence of the blessing of money and livelihood. Seeing short clothes indicates a lack of debt and can indicate debt and financial conditions. Difficult and short clothes show many expressions and can show lack of money, need, and lack of worship. It also indicates the separation of a loved one during his exile or death. Seeing clothes being cut by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing clothes being cut in a dream is one of those visions whose interpretation varies depending on the person and the circumstances surrounding it during the vision. Dreaming of cutting clothes to repair in a dream is a sign of kindness and a lot of nourishment. And the blessing of money. Cutting off other people’s clothes in a dream is evidence of sin and gossip, and that the dreamer speaks falsely and unjustly about others. Seeing new cut clothes in a dream indicates many differences and problems with friends and family. Seeing short clothes in a dream is a sign of a poor life and lack of money. And poverty. The interpretation of a dream of cutting clothes in a dream indicates the loss of a close person or the loss of something dear to the dreamer. Dreaming of seeing yellow clothes cut in a dream is a sign of destroying evil, treating illness, and relieving stress. It is recommended to see black clothes cut in a dream as an indication of getting rid of problems. And sorrows and overcoming crises. Seeing yourself cutting clothes in a dream Seeing torn clothes on the dreamer indicates the sadness and tension that he is going through, as well as the problems and crises that he is facing. It can indicate committing sins and escaping from God. In a married woman’s dream, seeing her torn clothes indicates financial crises. The torn clothes that she is going through also show many differences between her and her husband, but getting rid of the torn clothes in the dream and replacing them with new ones indicates that the dreamer’s condition will improve and change for the better, and the problems and difficulties that he is experiencing in his life will disappear. God knows best. Seeing a dead person wearing torn clothes in a dream indicates his need for zakat, prayers and seeking forgiveness for him. It can indicate the judgments that the viewer is subjected to. Watch cutting clothes for single people. Interpretation of a dream about cutting silk clothes in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the approaching date of engagement and marriage to a person of great importance among people. People. Seeing scissors cutting clothes in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of many quarrels that led to the disintegration of their relationship. Interpretation of a dream about cutting and burning clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she will enter into a new romantic relationship and it may end in failure. Seeing a piece of cloth in a dream A single woman’s dream is evidence that she will achieve what she wants and achieve what she aspires to in all aspects of her life. Seeing cut clothes for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing pieces of clothes changed in a dream for a married woman is evidence of her ability to confront and solve her problems and support her husband and family. A dream of cutting her husband’s clothes in a dream indicates The matzo woman

title: Interpretation of a rock in a dream: Seeing a stone and stones in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Walking on sea rocks in a dream, unmarried girl, pregnant married woman, falling, throwing stones at someone, white pebbles. A rock in a dream. It refers to women who have great patience and have proven their worth throughout life. Seeing a rock indicates stability, stability, and longevity and can It also indicates forgetfulness. Dreaming of a rock in a dream indicates immorality in many cases, but on the positive side, it can indicate a long-term situation or a sick wife who has great self-confidence in what is in front of her. If the dreamer sees rocks above the mountains, this indicates men Those with a hard heart and rocks most often show cruelty, neglect, and ignorance who do not know what they want from this life and have no mercy for others in what they do or want. If a rock falls in a dream from the sky, then the dreamer should know that people accept war and fighting. Whoever climbs a rock while he is single will get married, and whoever hits a rock and water comes down from it while he is poor, will become rich. Whoever climbs a rock in a dream and tries to remove it from its place, the larger its size, the greater the amount of money he will obtain. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is building his house from hewn stone, this is a sign On the glory that he will enjoy, along with the hope and security that he will enjoy in the future. If the dreamer is married or about to get married and dreams that he is building his house from hewn stone, this is a sign of the preservation of the family, the success of the marriage, and the good functioning of the relationship. Whoever sees in a dream that a place The carved stones are clay bricks, this indicates loss and failure in achieving the goals set in advance, in addition to a change in circumstances and business, until the appearance of divorce. Whoever sees in a dream that the marble tombs have turned into carved stones, this indicates a change in the status of business and trade that the deceased endowed him with. Or a change in the status of his heirs who seek to make several transfers. The black stone in a dream generally indicates Hajj, and is an indication that the dreamer must go on the annual Hajj. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is cutting the black stone, this indicates his stubbornness and adherence. With his opinion and his desire for people to agree with his opinion without any objection. Whoever sees in a dream that people lost the Black Stone and began searching for it and soon found it, this indicates the dreamer’s doubt about the people around him and his certainty that he is the only one on the right path. The Black Stone in a dream indicates A secret that the dreamer knows and hides from his family and close friends. The black stone in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s unique opinion and decisions, especially if he dreams of taking out the black stone and taking it with him. Whoever sees that he swallows the black stone, this is an indication that he will be an obstacle to others, and that he is trying to distance them from their faith. Whoever dreams of kissing the black stone, this indicates his respect for his parents, wife, and family, or perhaps it shows the great service he provides to those responsible for him. Whoever dreams that he succeeds in carrying the carved stone, this indicates that he will be victorious over his enemies. But if he sees that he failed to lift the stone, or S

title: Seeing lettuce in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: Therefore, in this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream for women, single women, married women, and men. Interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream for a single girl. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that there is land filled with large quantities of lettuce, this vision is one of the visions that indicate goodness and happiness for this girl because it indicates... However, she heard very exciting and happy news about this girl and that she has been waiting for such news for a while. Seeing lettuce in general in a girl’s dream. It is considered one of the dreams that symbolize happiness, and that this girl will be able to satisfy all her desires in life through her patience, toil, and her relationship. Kind and pure in the name of her great Lord. As for seeing her cutting lettuce in an unmarried girl’s dream, it is a sign of the end of a difficult period that this girl was going through. She will regain her great self-confidence and prepare herself well to overcome any obstacle she faces again. About seeing growing lettuce in an unmarried girl’s dream. Among the dreams that indicate peace in this girl’s heart. Then the Almighty God will compensate her and give her a very good husband. This girl deserves his share and she will live a wonderful life. See also: Interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream: eating, buying, cutting, planting. Interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation by famous scholars. Interpretation of dreams is that seeing lettuce in general in a married woman’s dream. It is one of the dreams that indicates that this woman is living in a dilemma in her married life and that there are many problems between her and her husband and her husband’s family due to conflicting opinions between them. As for seeing lettuce in the married woman’s house during her sleep , and that her husband brought it home. Evidence of this woman’s husband’s willingness to establish and establish his own company. This company will bring him great profits and this will completely change their lives in luxury. About seeing cut lettuce in a married woman’s dream. It is one of the dreams that indicates that this woman is able to achieve What she wants is by dividing her life into important steps so that she can move forward in her life in an organized way. When a married woman dreams of large quantities of rotten lettuce. This vision is evidence that this woman is exposed to some financial crises that affect the nature of her spending. Something that exposes her to events that she did not want In reaching it, such as many different debts. Interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream for a divorced woman. When a divorced woman sees lettuce in a dream in general in a dream. It is a sign of the psychological comfort in which this woman lives. And she reached this current situation through the freedom she gained after her separation. About her ex-husband. About a divorced woman seeing cutting lettuce in a dream. One of the dreams is that this woman carries some signs of goodness and hope, and there are some indications that this woman will return to her ex-husband again and live happily. Seeing buying lettuce in a divorced woman’s dream. This vision It is a sign that this woman is able to manage all her affairs on her own without the need for anyone to help her. He achieved a lot in those steps and walked steadily. Seeing rotten lettuce in a divorced woman’s dream. It is one of the indications of the presence of good friends.
